comments:
The nature activation logic currently tries to match the nature ID to patterns.
 This ID is artificial.  We need to convert nature ID into an
IPluginContribution with the appropriate local/plugin IDs.

Fix in HEAD.  We keep our own table of nature ID->IPluginContribution for proper
activity determination.  This table responds to dyanmic UI changes.

This is currently causing an invalid thread access. The resource listener 
update should be done in a WorkbenchJob.
